post:
To our friends at LowEndTalk, we've got a great deal for you! We'll be continuing <i>part</i> of our most recent <a href="http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/urpad-256mb-openvz-12year-6-95-1024mb-ssd-in-dallas-los-angeles-and-chicago/">LowEndBox Promotion</a> by offering our 2GB VPS plans for $6.95/mo in Los Angeles, California; Chicago, Illinois; Dallas, Texas and now in sunny <b>Miami, Florida!</b>

<h1>Here's the scoop:</h1>
• 2048MB RAM
• 50GB Disk Space
• 1 IPv4 Address
• 750GB Bandwidth
• 100Mbps Port
• OpenVZ/SolusVM
• Price: $6.95/mo</b> (after coupon)
• Coupon Code: L3BK1W1

Location Choices (choose in order form):
• Los Angeles, CA
• Dallas, TX
• Chicago, IL
• Miami, FL

<h1>[<a href="https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=237&promocode=L3BK1W1">Order Now</a>]</h1>

This offer is only designed as a Limited time deal and will expire once stock is filled.

Network Test:

Los Angeles, CA – QuadraNet Datacenter – Test IP: 98.143.159.202
Dallas, TX - Colo4 Datacenter - Test IP: 198.12.71.130
Chicago, IL - ColoCrossing's Datacenter - Test IP: 198.144.179.130
Miami, FL - QuadraNet Datacenter - Test IP: 173.44.33.162
